00027 BOOLEAN EnterBobbyRAmmo()
00028 {
00029   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00030 
00031       //gfBigImageMouseRegionCreated = FALSE;
00032 
00033       // load the background graphic and add it
00034       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00035       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\ammobackground.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00036       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAmmoBackground));
00037 
00038       // load the gunsgrid graphic and add it
00039       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00040       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\ammogrid.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00041       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAmmoGrid));
00042 
00043       InitBobbyBrTitle();
00044 
00045       guiPrevAmmoFilterMode = -1;
00046       guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = -1;
00047 
00048       SetFirstLastPagesForNew( IC_AMMO, guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode );
00049 
00050       //Draw menu bar
00051       InitBobbyMenuBar( );
00052       InitBobbyRAmmoFilterBar();
00053 
00054       RenderBobbyRAmmo( );
00055 
00056       return(TRUE);
00057 }
00058 
00059 void ExitBobbyRAmmo()
00060 {
00061       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAmmoBackground);
00062       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAmmoGrid);
00063       DeleteBobbyMenuBar();
00064 
00065       // WANNE
00066       DeleteBobbyRAmmoFilter();
00067 
00068       DeleteBobbyBrTitle();
00069       DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
00070 
00071       giCurrentSubPage = gusCurWeaponIndex;
00072       guiLastBobbyRayPage = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_AMMO;
00073 }

00079 void RenderBobbyRAmmo()
00080 {
00081       HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00082 
00083       WebPageTileBackground(BOBBYR_NUM_HORIZONTAL_TILES, BOBBYR_NUM_VERTICAL_TILES, BOBBYR_BACKGROUND_WIDTH, BOBBYR_BACKGROUND_HEIGHT, guiAmmoBackground);
00084 
00085       //Display title at top of page
00086       //DisplayBobbyRBrTitle();
00087 
00088       // GunForm
00089       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiAmmoGrid);
00090       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, BOBBYR_GRIDLOC_X, BOBBYR_GRIDLOC_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00091 
00092       DisplayItemInfo(IC_AMMO, guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode);
00093       UpdateButtonText(guiCurrentLaptopMode);
00094       UpdateAmmoFilterButtons(guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode, guiPrevAmmoFilterMode);
00095 
00096       MarkButtonsDirty( );
00097       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00098       InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00099       fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00100       fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;     
00101 }
